proposal: Navigating the complexities of the crypto world can be as challenging as understanding the nuances of a kickback case, but with 349 holders in the ETH network, it seems you've mastered it. Our tools, like DEX and Lottery, are designed to further empower your community, not just to participate, but to thrive by deploying revenue-sharing tools themselves. Let's build a stronger ecosystem together, where every holder feels like a part of the project's success.
